QueryViewSpecExtension.Name: DH - CM - Constituent Name Sort Key Query Extension
QueryViewSpecExtension.Description: An extension to the Constituents query view
QueryViewSpecExtension.Author: Dignity Health

AddField.SelectClause: SELECT LTRIM(RTRIM(KEYNAME)) + LTRIM(RTRIM(FIRSTNAME)) + LTRIM(RTRIM(MIDDLENAME)) AS SORTKEY FROM CONSTITUENT C where [C].[ID] = [CONSTITUENT].[ID]
